name: HexBotX
description: Userbot Created And Maintained By Akashi

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally

MAX_FLOOD_IN_P_M_s.description: Maximum number of messages a person can send in pm before getting blocked. Value must be an integer. 3 by default.

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for gitcommit plugin. Google 'Github access token' to find.

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Your repo name; but GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN must be setup first.

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

SUDO_USERS.description: Makes your acc and bot stable. Enter your telegram User ID

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot.

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the username of your bot

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Your Private Group ID where you can install external modules

CHROMEDRIVER_VERSION.description: For Carbon.py. Leave it as it is.

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
